00034 #ifndef _PLT_XML_HELPER_H_
00035 #define _PLT_XML_HELPER_H_
00036 
00037 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 |   includes
00039 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 #include "Neptune.h"
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   PLT_XmlAttributeFinder
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 class PLT_XmlAttributeFinder
00049 {
00050 public:
00051     // if 'namespc' is NULL, we're looking for ANY namespace
00052     // if 'namespc' is '\0', we're looking for NO namespace
00053     // if 'namespc' is non-empty, look for that SPECIFIC namespace
00054     PLT_XmlAttributeFinder(const NPT_XmlElementNode& element, 
00055                            const char*               name, 
00056                            const char*               namespc) : 
00057       m_Element(element), m_Name(name), m_Namespace(namespc) {}
00058 
00059     bool operator()(const NPT_XmlAttribute* const & attribute) const {
00060         if (attribute->GetName() == m_Name) {
00061             if (m_Namespace) {
00062                 const NPT_String& prefix = attribute->GetPrefix();
00063                 if (m_Namespace[0] == '\0') {
00064                     // match if the attribute has NO namespace
00065                     return prefix.IsEmpty();
00066                 } else {
00067                     // match if the attribute has the SPECIFIC namespace
00068                     // we're looking for
00069                     const NPT_String* namespc = m_Element.GetNamespaceUri(prefix);
00070                     return namespc && *namespc == m_Namespace;
00071                 }
00072             } else {
00073                 // ANY namespace will match
00074                 return true;
00075             }
00076         } else {
00077             return false;
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081 private:
00082     const NPT_XmlElementNode& m_Element;
00083     const char*               m_Name;
00084     const char*               m_Namespace;
00085 };
00086 
00087 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 |   PLT_XmlHelper
00089 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 class PLT_XmlHelper
00095 {
00096 public:
00097 
00098     // static methods
00099     static NPT_Result GetChildText(NPT_XmlElementNode* node, 
00100                                    const char*         tag, 
00101                                    NPT_String&         value,
00102                                    const char*         namespc = "") {
00103         value = "";
00104 
00105         if (!node) return NPT_FAILURE;
00106 
00107         // special case "" means we look for the same namespace as the parent
00108         if (namespc && namespc[0] == '\0') namespc = node->GetNamespace()?node->GetNamespace()->GetChars():NPT_XML_NO_NAMESPACE;
00109 
00110         NPT_XmlElementNode* child = node->GetChild(tag, namespc);
00111         if (!child) return NPT_FAILURE;
00112 
00113         const NPT_String* text = child->GetText();
00114         value = text?*text:"";
00115         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00116     }
00117                                    
00118     static NPT_Result RemoveAttribute(NPT_XmlElementNode* node, 
00119                                       const char*         name,
00120                                       const char*         namespc = "") {
00121         if (!node) return NPT_FAILURE;
00122 
00123         // special case "" means we look for the same namespace as the parent
00124         if (namespc && namespc[0] == '\0') namespc = node->GetNamespace()?node->GetNamespace()->GetChars():NPT_XML_NO_NAMESPACE;
00125 
00126         NPT_List<NPT_XmlAttribute*>::Iterator attribute;
00127         attribute = node->GetAttributes().Find(PLT_XmlAttributeFinder(*node, name, namespc));
00128         if (!attribute) return NPT_FAILURE;
00129 
00130         delete *attribute;
00131         NPT_CHECK(node->GetAttributes().Erase(attribute));
00132 
00133         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00134     }
00135                                    
00136     static NPT_Result GetAttribute(NPT_XmlElementNode* node, 
00137                                    const char*         name,
00138                                    NPT_XmlAttribute*&  attr,
00139                                    const char*         namespc = "") {
00140         attr = NULL;
00141 
00142         if (!node) return NPT_FAILURE;
00143 
00144         // special case "" means we look for the same namespace as the parent
00145         if (namespc && namespc[0] == '\0') namespc = node->GetNamespace()?node->GetNamespace()->GetChars():NPT_XML_NO_NAMESPACE;
00146 
00147         NPT_List<NPT_XmlAttribute*>::Iterator attribute;
00148         attribute = node->GetAttributes().Find(PLT_XmlAttributeFinder(*node, name, namespc));
00149         if (!attribute) {
00150             NPT_Debug("Failed to find attribute [%s]:%s", namespc, name);
00151             return NPT_FAILURE;
00152         }
00153 
00154         attr = (*attribute);
00155         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00156     }
00157 
00158     static NPT_Result GetAttribute(NPT_XmlElementNode* node, 
00159                                    const char*         name,
00160                                    NPT_String&         value,
00161                                    const char*         namespc = "") {
00162         value = "";
00163         
00164         NPT_XmlAttribute* attribute = NULL;
00165         NPT_CHECK(GetAttribute(node, name, attribute, namespc));
00166         if (!attribute) return NPT_FAILURE;
00167 
00168         value = attribute->GetValue();
00169         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00170     }
00171 
00172     static NPT_Result SetAttribute(NPT_XmlElementNode* node, 
00173                                    const char*         name,
00174                                    NPT_String&         value,
00175                                    const char*         namespc = "") {
00176         NPT_XmlAttribute* attribute = NULL;
00177         NPT_CHECK(GetAttribute(node, name, attribute, namespc));
00178         if (!attribute) return NPT_FAILURE;
00179 
00180         attribute->SetValue(value);
00181         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00182     }
00183 
00184     static NPT_Result AddChildText(NPT_XmlElementNode* node,
00185                                    const char*         tag,
00186                                    const char*         text,
00187                                    const char*         prefix = NULL) {
00188         if (!node) return NPT_FAILURE;
00189         NPT_XmlElementNode* child = new NPT_XmlElementNode(prefix, tag);
00190         child->AddText(text);
00191         return node->AddChild(child);
00192     }
00193 
00194     static bool IsMatch(const NPT_XmlNode* const & node, const char* tag, const char* namespc_mapped) {
00195         // if m_Namespace is NULL, we're looking for ANY namespace
00196         // if m_Namespace is '\0', we're looking for NO namespace
00197         // if m_Namespace is non-empty, look for that SPECIFIC namespace
00198         
00199         const NPT_XmlElementNode* element = node->AsElementNode();
00200         // is tag the same (case sensitive)?
00201         if (element && element->GetTag() == tag) {
00202             if (namespc_mapped) {
00203                 // look for a SPECIFIC namespace or NO namespace
00204                 const NPT_String* namespc = element->GetNamespace();
00205                 if (namespc) {
00206                     // the element has a namespace, match if it is equal to
00207                     // what we're looking for
00208                     return *namespc == namespc_mapped;
00209                 } else {
00210                     // the element does not have a namespace, match if we're
00211                     // looking for NO namespace
00212                     return namespc_mapped[0] == '\0';
00213                 }
00214             } else {
00215                 // ANY namespace will match
00216                 return true;
00217             }
00218         }
00219         return false;
00220     } 
00221 
00222     static NPT_Result GetChildren(NPT_XmlElementNode*              node,
00223                                   NPT_Array<NPT_XmlElementNode*>&  children,
00224                                   const char*                      tag,
00225                                   const char*                      namespc = "") {
00226         if (!node) return NPT_FAILURE;
00227 
00228         // special case "" means we look for the same namespace as the parent
00229         if (namespc && namespc[0] == '\0') namespc = node->GetNamespace()?node->GetNamespace()->GetChars():NPT_XML_NO_NAMESPACE;
00230 
00231         const char* namespc_mapped = (namespc==NULL)?"":(namespc[0]=='*' && namespc[1]=='\0')?NULL:namespc;
00232 
00233         // get all children first
00234         NPT_List<NPT_XmlNode*>& allchildren = node->GetChildren();
00235 
00236         // iterate through children and add only elements with matching tag
00237         NPT_List<NPT_XmlNode*>::Iterator child = allchildren.GetFirstItem();
00238         while  (child) {
00239             if (IsMatch(*child, tag, namespc_mapped)) {
00240                 children.Add((*child)->AsElementNode());
00241             }
00242             ++child;
00243         }
00244         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00245     }
00246 
00247     static NPT_XmlElementNode* GetChild(NPT_XmlElementNode* node,
00248                                         const char*         tag,
00249                                         const char*         namespc = "") {
00250         if (!node) return NULL;
00251 
00252         // special case "" means we look for the same namespace as the parent
00253         if (namespc && namespc[0] == '\0') namespc = node->GetNamespace()?node->GetNamespace()->GetChars():NPT_XML_NO_NAMESPACE;
00254 
00255         return node->GetChild(tag, namespc);
00256     }
00257 
00258     static NPT_Result GetChild(NPT_XmlElementNode*  parent,
00259                                NPT_XmlElementNode*& child,
00260                                NPT_Ordinal          n = 0) {
00261         if (!parent) return NPT_FAILURE;
00262 
00263         // reset child
00264         child = NULL;
00265 
00266         // get all children first
00267         NPT_List<NPT_XmlNode*>::Iterator children = parent->GetChildren().GetFirstItem();
00268         while  (children) {
00269             if ((*children)->AsElementNode() && n-- == 0) {
00270                 child = (*children)->AsElementNode();
00271                 return NPT_SUCCESS;
00272             }
00273             children++;
00274         }
00275 
00276         return NPT_FAILURE;
00277     }
00278 
00279     static NPT_Result Serialize(NPT_XmlNode& node, NPT_String& xml, bool add_header = true, NPT_Int8 indentation = 0) {
00280         NPT_XmlWriter writer(indentation);
00281         NPT_StringOutputStreamReference stream(new NPT_StringOutputStream(&xml));
00282         NPT_CHECK(writer.Serialize(node, *stream, add_header));
00283         return NPT_SUCCESS;
00284     }
00285 
00286     static NPT_String Serialize(NPT_XmlNode& node, bool add_header = true, NPT_Int8 indentation = 0) {
00287         NPT_XmlWriter writer(indentation);
00288         NPT_String xml;
00289         NPT_StringOutputStreamReference stream(new NPT_StringOutputStream(&xml));
00290         if (NPT_FAILED(writer.Serialize(node, *stream, add_header))) {
00291             NPT_Debug("Failed to serialize xml node");
00292             return "";
00293         }
00294 
00295         return xml;
00296     }
00297 private:
00298     // members
00299 };
00300 
00301 #endif // _PLT_XML_HELPER_H_
